name: Beacon
description: A signal fire or light provides navigation aid and communication for travelers and ships. The elevated position provides excellent visibility, while the strategic importance makes it vulnerable to attack or sabotage.
atmosphere: Crackling flames dance in the wind while smoke rises from the elevated position like a signal to the heavens. The air carries the scent of burning wood, smoke, and the promise of navigation guidance. Every surface feels the heat of strategic importance. Your skin feels the fire's warmth and the sense of elevated vulnerability. The taste of navigation aid and strategic significance fills your mouth.
